patthana15.36:1.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana15.36:2.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.36:3.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.36:4.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto nasāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.36:4.1_1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto naanāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
